snippet: A stampede in an indoor stadium, the Madrid Arena, killed three young women and critically injured two others early Thursday as thousands of people attended a Halloween dance party.
lead_paragraph: A stampede in an indoor stadium, the Madrid Arena, killed three young women and critically injured two others early Thursday as thousands of people attended a Halloween dance party.

headline.seo: Spain: Three Killed During Stampede at Dance Party
headline.main: Spain: Three Killed During Stampede at Dance Party
headline.print_headline: Spain: Three Killed During Stampede at Dance Party
